B

BarChart - Class in hr.fer.zemris.java.gui.charts
Encapsulates data needed for creation of a bar chart.

Constructor initializes all variables in new BarChart using input parameters.
BarChartComponent - Class in hr.fer.zemris.java.gui.charts
Component displaying bar chart.
BarChartComponent(BarChart) - Constructor for class hr.fer.zemris.java.gui.charts.BarChartComponent
Constructor initializes bar chart component using BarChart object which encapsulates all data needed for drawing bar chart.
BarChartDemo - Class in hr.fer.zemris.java.gui.charts
Application for demonstration of usage of BarChartComponent.
BarChartDemo(Path, BarChart) - Constructor for class hr.fer.zemris.java.gui.charts.BarChartDemo
Constructor initializes application using path to filename containing data (only used for printing filename on screen) and reference to BarChart object containing data used for actual drawing.
